name: Polar Powers
description:
Defend your cabin against the invaders using your magical "polar" powers. 

Small top-down shooter game prototype made in a 48 hours game jam by three first-year game development students at Malmö University. This was our first time using a game engine(Unity) to create a game.

Developers:

  • Allan Majid
  • Edgar Sjöberg
  • Angelo Darwiche
